name: Big Adventure: Trip to Europe 5 - Collector's Edition
name_original: Big Adventure: Trip to Europe 5 - Collector's Edition
description:
"Big Adventure: Trip to Europe 5" is a hidden object game that offers you an exciting journey through 15 beautiful European countries. During the game, you will find interesting objects in historical places of Europe and Scandinavia, play exciting mini-games and collect tons of objects souvenirs.

This exciting trip will allow you to visit 30 beautiful places and tourist attractions. Swim in the Montenegrin resort of Rafailovici, visit the beautiful city of Luxembourg and the Port Aventura amusement park and explore many wonderful museums, including the museum of musical instruments. Listen to music at a jazz festival and visit the famous Stonehenge.


The collector's edition includes:
- 8 additional locations - Visit even more attractions and a fun raccoon!
- 8 additional new mini-games + 12 more for puzzle lovers
- Beautiful desktop wallpapers
- Music player
- Album with exclusive postage stamps
- 20 great souvenirs from the trip
- Achievements page
